about_the_game:
Welcome to the once-thriving realm of Eldrathia, now a land shrouded in darkness and chaos. Fight your way trough waves of ferocious monsters and possesseds knights. Unleash new powers and overcome mighty foes, in order to reveal the shadowy responsible for this terror.

Key Features:


🔥 Randomly Generated Realms: Dive into dynamically evolving dungeons filled with challenges, hidden treasures, and relentless adversaries. Adapt to the ever-changing terrain and survive the unpredictable twists of fate.

⚔️ Viking Warriors Unleashed: Assume the role of a fierce Viking warrior, each boasting unique skills infused with the power of the gods.

🛡️ Challenging Boss Battles: Face off against powerful bosses that demand skill and strategy. From colossal giants to mythical creatures, every encounter is a test of your prowess. Only the boldest will conquer these formidable foes.

🏹 Godly Skills: Wield divine powers to turn the tide of battle, and strategically combine your abilities for maximum impact.

💀 Perma-Death Awaits: Embrace the challenge of permanent death, where each defeat is a lesson. Gain experience and knowledge, growing stronger with every rebirth. Only true berserkers can endure the harsh cycle of life and death.

🎶 Epic Soundtrack: Enhance your gaming experience with an immersive soundtrack that echoes the grandeur of Viking legends. Let the music fuel your battlecry as you face the chaos and challenge the gods themselves.



Embark on a perilous journey, harness the divine powers within, and carve your saga into the annals of Viking lore. "Battlecry Berserkers" beckons those courageous enough to face the harsh trials of the realm of Eldrathia. Will you emerge as a legendary hero, or will your tale fade into the echoes of time? The choice is yours to make.

name: Battlecry Berserkers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 440
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Fight your way trough waves of enemies and make your own path. Unleash new powers, consume the power of the runes, and defeat mighty foes. Free Eldrathia from these monsters!
